articles.title: Renukaswamy murder case: Actor Darshan, other accused used SIM not in their name - India Today
articles.description: India Today has obtained the latest remand copy revealing critical details about the ongoing investigation Actor Darshan Pavithra Gowda and several other accused were found using SIM cards registered under different names
